actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration, S. Rept. 93-667.

official_title: Resolves that the Committee on Finance is authorized to expend from the contingent fund of the Senate, during the Ninety-third Congress, $20,000 in addition to the amounts, and for the same purposes specified in section 134(a) of the Legislative Reorganization Act of 1946, and in Senate Resolution 148, Ninety-third Congress, agreed to August 2, 1973.

summary.text: Authorizes the Committee on Finance to expend from the contingent fund of the Senate, during the Ninety-third Congress, $20,000 in addition to the amounts, and for investigatory purposes specified in S. Res 148, 93d Congress.

titles.title: Resolves that the Committee on Finance is authorized to expend from the contingent fund of the Senate, during the Ninety-third Congress, $20,000 in addition to the amounts, and for the same purposes specified in section 134(a) of the Legislative Reorganization Act of 1946, and in Senate Resolution 148, Ninety-third Congress, agreed to August 2, 1973.
